Title: Abohomaan
Writer: Rituparno Ghosh (story and screenplay), Madhuchhanda Karlekar (screenplay)
Actors: Dipankar Dey, Mamata Shankar, Jishu Sengupta, Ananya Chatterjee
Plot: Abohomaan tells the story of Aniket, one of the finest filmmakers of Bengal in eastern India and the loves of his life. Devoted to his craft, Aniket met and fell in love with his wife ...
